title: About
text:
Athens · Greece
I am experienced in machine learning and deep learning with focus on Computer Vision. My research interests are object detection and segmentation.
  

“If we want machines to think, we need first to teach them how to see” — Fei-Fei Li




Software Development Intern
National Center of Scientific Research “Demokritos”
July 2016 - Aug 2016
Implementation of a software tool to process data from RGB-D camera mounted on a personal home assistant robot to analyze human behavior. Contributed video analysis software and integrated audio/laser modules. Part of the RADIO personal home assistant robot system.




University of Thessaly
5 year Diploma (BSc & MSc combined - 300ECTS)
Electrical, Electronics and Communications Engineering
Focus: Machine Learning and Computer Vision
Graduated with Very Good: 7.12/10.0
July 2018




Programming Languages & Tools: - Python, Qt, LATEX, Keras, Tensorflow, Bash, Matlab, Octave, ROS, CUDA, C, C++, Apache Spark, OpenMP, OpenCV
Applied Knowledge: - Digital Signal Processing, Image Processing, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Computer Vision, Artificial Intelligence, Statistics, Reinforcement Learning
Know how: - Robotics, High Performance Computing, Parallel & Cluster Computing, Big Data Technologies, Communication Systems




Apart from being an AI enthusiast, I enjoy boxing and biking. In the winter, I travel abroad with good company. During warmer months in Athens, I enjoy driving to the coastline. Indoors, I watch movies, read books, and solve algorithmic riddles.





Grow Greek Tourism Online - Google
Machine Learning - Coursera
Neural Networks for Machine Learning - Coursera
The Numpy Stack in Python - Udemy
Taming Big Data with Apache Spark and Python - Udemy
The Ultimate Hands-On Hadoop - Udemy
